actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend to 10 years the delimiting period in which veterans must complete their educational programs.

summary.text: Provides veterans with a 10-year delimiting period (presently 8-year period) for completing education programs under title 38 (Veterans' Benefits) of the United States Code. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1662)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend to 10 years the delimiting period in which veterans must complete their educational programs.
